Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Mechanoid A', 3: 'This is our wall! You go find somewhere else!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Mechanoid B', 3: "I'm better at drawing than you, so I should be the one to paint it. That's the rule in Constellia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Mechanoid A', 3: "Says who? No one agreed you're better than me. You're just talking *mechanical slang* nonsense!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'You and Ayla are passing by the graffiti district when you hear several mechanoids arguing loudly near the wall.'}
{3: 'As soon as they say the word "draw," Ayla\'s eyes light up. She tugs on your sleeve, excited.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: '【kuroname】, look over there...', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're interested in this place, aren't you?", 3: '17', 4: "Let's go check it out then.", 5: '17'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Mhm! You always know exactly what I want to do. It's so easy going out with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla gives you a bright smile full of trust.'}
{3: "It's not really that you knew what she wanted—you've just gotten used to her spontaneous ideas. But there's no need to say that out loud."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{3: "Ayla grabs your hand and hurries toward the mechanoids. It doesn't take long for her to figure out what's going on."}
{3: 'The wall here is known as the "Champion\'s Wall". Only the winner of a graffiti face-off gets the right to paint on it.'}
{3: "Today is the Double Seventh Festival. The committee's mechanoids came to paint something festive, but they ran into resistance from a rival graffiti group."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "If that's the case, why not settle it with a live drawing contest?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Mechanoid A', 3: "We suggested that too. But it said there's no judge, so it refused to battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Mechanoid A', 3: "Wait... since you two are here, why don't you be our judges and models?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid points at you. You feel caught off guard and a little confused.'}
{2: 'Little Mechanoid A', 3: "That's right. You'll be our models. And what better time for a couple's portrait than the Double Seventh Festival?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Mechanoid B', 3: "I don't mind if a human serve as the judge.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just then, a bunch of props are dragged over. The mechanoids push you and Ayla a little farther from the canvases.'}
{3: 'One of them shoves a bouquet into Ayla\'s hands. Apparently she\'s supposed to play the "girlfriend with flowers."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She stands beside you, clutching the flowers, clearly nervous.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Uhh... I've never done anything like this before...", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '【kuroname】, what should we do?', 5: '1'}
{3: 'She looks a little unsure, glancing at you for help.'}
{2: '(Guide Ayla into a pose)', 3: '48', 4: '(Hold her hand)', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh, we just need to hold hands like this...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Okay, I guess we just stand like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm, is it just me, or do you seem kinda used to this, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You\'ve managed to help her strike the perfect "girlfriend holding a bouquet" pose, yet Ayla puffs out her cheeks and seems to be sulking.'}
{2: '(Play dumb)', 3: '58', 4: '(Explain yourself)', 5: '59'}
{2: "Ayla, look toward the mechanoids' cameras.", 3: '60'}
{2: "Don't get the wrong idea. It's my first time too.", 3: '65'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...Forget it, 【kuroname】. You're such a dummy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla turns her head away, her grumbling voice growing softer.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...I mean, I kinda figured that already.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She blushes, lowering her eyes to avoid your gaze.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Still... I'm glad you said it anyway.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Mechanoids', 3: '—All done! We finished our paintings! Take a look! Which one do you like better?', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Just then, the mechanoids rush over, excitedly holding up two canvases.'}
{3: "Looking closer, both paintings show you and Ayla standing side by side. They've even managed to capture the faint blush that briefly lit up her face."}
{3: "Both paintings are equally well done. It's honestly hard to say which one is better at a glance."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hmm... they're both really good. I can't decide either.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You and Ayla say the exact same thing at the same time.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Then how about this? You both win first place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "And for the festival promo... I'll buy the most eye-catching ad space in Constellia and let you two use it however you want. How's that?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Mechanoid A & B', 3: "R-really? But that spot's incredibly expensive...", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Nothing comes for free, of course.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla grins and takes both paintings from their hands, hugging them close.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'In exchange, these are mine now.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Protest)', 3: '99', 4: 'Wait... at least let me keep one!', 5: '99'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Nope! Not a chance!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla tosses the bouquet into your hands and runs a few steps ahead, laughing.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{3: "Bathed in the sunset, her smile catches the light—so bright you can't look away."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If you want them, then come and get them!', 4: '1'}
